TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted it's on a mars bar

I wish for the planet saturn

Granted: You are immediately transported to it with the deed in your hand. I think you can guess how long you survived on the surface for.

I wish for a KSP 1 with all the best mods seamlessly intergrated into it.

Granted. Planets from different mods collide.

I wish the universe was written on Unity, to make objects irl.

Granted, now it's exploited by billionaires and they send the code through piles of errors. Perhaps a new ending to the Universe: The Big Error.

I wish for a soulmate.

Granted. A human mage summons you from your astral plane. Now you have a mate creature with a soul.

I wish to understand why there is so many strange things around.

 

 

Edited May 22, 2023 by kerbiloid

Granted: Now you are an agent for Warehouse 13.

I wish they had made more episodes.

Granted. Wait. It's real...

I wish it wasn't.

Spoiler

Though, it is, and right around.

but it is real 

i wish for NASA to buy starship for artemis

They do, but then NASA realizes too late it's a Chinese fake and it's coming straight from the junkyard and it almost explodes on take-off.

 

I wish for the Science update in KSP2.

Granted: Now it is so realistic that you have to start at the very beginings of science in the real world and progressively work your way through the centuries of experiments and discoveries that led to modern metalurgy, explosive potential, electrical circuits, ballistic equations etc, that are required to work together to make a successful launch. (or you could go the Fast and Furious movies route and just strap some rockets to a car, launch it off the back of a plane and achieve orbit while wearing a dive suit and some duct tape.)

I wish for submarines that can go into space.

granted an issue occurs and the oxygen runs out you dead

I wish for Skylab to launch again

You have to rob the Australian museum first.

I wish there were aerial orbital stations.
You have to make you own I wish for a new timeline

Granted. It's 00:00:00.

I wish for a new timecircle.

Edited May 23, 2023 by kerbiloid

Granted: You are stuck in a time loop. Granted: You are stuck in a time loop. Granted you are stuck in a time loop....

I wish for a do over.

Granted: You are stuck in a time loop. Granted: You are stuck in a time loop. Granted you are stuck in a time loop....

I wish to hold the flashy thing for a while...

Granted you get caught like big foot looking sus 

I wish for skylab

G'day mate. Your wish has been granted. You're in Esperance, Australia, July 12th 1979. It is just past the midnight hour. You are standing in the midst of the outback when you see bright streaks in the night sky. One appears almost motionless for a short while, but then appear to draw nearer. Get ready to receive Skylab, albeit, a giant chuck of it.

I wish to visit the last of the Babylon stations, that shining beacon in space, all alone in the night.

granted you endup in space cant find it 

i wish for Banception

Granted. The banception is thrown.

catch(...) !

You get hit on the head with a cricket ball and get ko,d 

I wish for the iss

Granted. You have a whole lot of is, whatever it is.

I wish for a brand new brand.

granted get a new band a new ban 

i wish for Skylab
